title: Sno-Show (Vermillion Editions' 15th Anniversary Exhibition)
marks:

LLC: [Run #3]
description: Color run for \"Sno-Show\"; sled, L of center; person\'s leg, UR; a sign on L that reads \"VERMILLION/MOBILE/STUDIO/NUMBER 1\"; other inchoate subjects throughout
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of David Parker
